bronze:DecasWashers.NAME: Deca's Washers
bronze:DecasWashers.FLAVOR: It is unclear why Deca collects these.

bronze:SilverBullet.NAME: Silver Bullet

bronze:ElectromagneticCoil.NAME: Electromagnetic Coil

bronze:DonusWashers.NAME: Donu's Washers

bronze:BronzeIdol.NAME: Bronze Idol

bronze:AnalyticalCore.NAME: Paradox Artifact
